    x = [change[0] for change in changes]
    d = [change[1] for change in changes]
    b_max = n * (n - 1) / 2
    b_min = n ** 2 // 4
    b = [di * (b_max if di > 0 else b_min) for di in d]
    max_mean = (n * sum(x) + sum(b)) / n
    return max_mean
